title: Disconnecting from games when internet and ping is completely normal
body:
Hey guys,

Since yesterday I keep disconnecting in loading screen after champ select, or gettign into game and immediatley lagging and tryign to reconnect. My wifi is as good as ever and my ping in loading screen is completely normal. 

I need help :(
Thanks

replies.body: Disconnecting on that loading screen is a pretty clear sign that something is interrupting your network from being able to get a solid link with our servers. We can cover the basics with the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but hit me back if that doesn't help.
